name: Twinsanity: Trapped in Time - Special Edition
name_original: Twinsanity: Trapped in Time - Special Edition
description:
STORY:

Twinsanity: Trapped in Time is an RPG game which is based on the series "Twinsanity The Animated Series". Prepare to race against time with the evil mastermind Time Shadow. He trapped Twinsanity in another timeline and your job is to return him home. Are you ready to help him?

FEATURES:

-Unlockable Costumes

-Stop-Motion Cutscenes

-Frame by Frame Animation

-New Weapons and Items

SPECIAL EDITION INCLUDES:

-Special Edition costume

-Battle Damaged costume

-Darksanity costume

-New Story: Time Shadow's Backstory
